Method Detail

add

public boolean add(T point)
Add the given sample to this cluster. Does not automatically remove the sample from other clusters of which it is already a member.

Specified by:
add in interface Cluster<T extends AdditiveClusterable<T>>
Overrides:
add in class AbstractCluster<T extends AdditiveClusterable<T>>
Parameters:
point - the sample to add
Returns:
true if the point was successfully added; false otherwise

addAll

public boolean addAll(Cluster<T> otherCluster)
Add all the samples in the given cluster to this cluster. Does not automatically remove the samples from other clusters of which they are already members.

Specified by:
addAll in interface Cluster<T extends AdditiveClusterable<T>>
Overrides:
addAll in class AbstractCluster<T extends AdditiveClusterable<T>>
Parameters:
otherCluster - the sample to add
Returns:
true if the point was successfully added; false otherwise

remove

public boolean remove(T point)
Remove the given sample from this cluster.

Specified by:
remove in interface Cluster<T extends AdditiveClusterable<T>>
Overrides:
remove in class AbstractCluster<T extends AdditiveClusterable<T>>
Parameters:
point - the sample to remove
Returns:
true if the point was successfully removed; false otherwise (in particular, if the point is not a member of this cluster in the first place)
